reviews.productTitle: Legrand radiant TM873WCC10 15 Amp Rocker Wall Switch, 3-Way Decorator Light Switches, White (1 Count)
reviews.text: This is my first time using Legrand. I really like their switches. They are low profile on the back and the terminal posts have the additional guard on them that helps hold the wire in and make the connection secure and makes the connection easier to wire. The shark bite connections are neat and clean but a pain if you have to take them back apart. The only problem was Amazon shipped what looked like was a used and returned product and it was missing the installation instructions that were supposed to be inside the box. But a Google search on the Legrand website turned up what I needed.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2024
reviews.title: Product is great but Amazon shipped a used device missing the installation instructions

reviews.productTitle: Legrand radiant TM873WCC10 15 Amp Rocker Wall Switch, 3-Way Decorator Light Switches, White (1 Count)
reviews.text: I bought these in May 2020 (for $3) and gave them away and though I cannot comment on their efficiency, the person I gave them to said he still has them over three years later. When I opened them they felt nice and sturdy, but then I wound up installing metallic light switches and these became unused spares. Since they arrived on time and in new condition and they are still being used today, that counts for something! These “Pass & Seymour TM873WCC10 3-Way 15 Amp Single Pole/3-Way Rocker Wall Light Switch, Three, White” light switches get a serviceable 3/5 stars!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.title: Makes an okay gift!

reviews.productTitle: Legrand radiant TM873WCC10 15 Amp Rocker Wall Switch, 3-Way Decorator Light Switches, White (1 Count)
reviews.text: This sleek and modern light switch is a brilliant addition to my home. Its contemporary design effortlessly elevates the overall aesthetic. The smooth finish and minimalist style blend seamlessly with any decor. Installing it was a breeze, and it adds a touch of sophistication to every room. If you're aiming for a modern look with functional simplicity, this light switch is an excellent choice.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.title: Modern Elegance

reviews.productTitle: Legrand radiant TM873WCC10 15 Amp Rocker Wall Switch, 3-Way Decorator Light Switches, White (1 Count)
reviews.text: I ordered two of these white 3-way switches, they were both obviously used when they arrived! Pictures are attached. One of them had a grey color paint on the edges. The other had dark brown paint all over the mounting tabs and the edge of the switch. Looking a bit closer, the switches are Leviton, the boxes they came in as well as the description is LeGrand! Unless you want used junk switches, I would avoid these!

reviews.productTitle: Legrand radiant TM873WCC10 15 Amp Rocker Wall Switch, 3-Way Decorator Light Switches, White (1 Count)
reviews.text: ## Updated: 9/30/23 I discovered there are holes on the back to push in wires for installation! I tried this with one of the switches and discovered the traveler wires were apparently in the wrong holes. I tried to push in the release hole with a flat screwdriver to release the wires, but no matter how hard I pushed the screwdriver in the release hole, the wire wouldn’t come out. I am going to return this as defective. If you can’t release the wires then it’s basically ruined. All the basic switches I’m replacing in the house have the same push-to-release wire mechanism in the back, and those work fine (they are made by Leviton). With the other Legrand switch I needed to install, I just used the screw terminals. That worked fine but it’s more time to configure. Anyway, just a warning that the release mechanism for the push wire installation method does not work on this switch by Legrand. ## Earlier review: Just installed and works fine. You can only use screw terminals for the wires to fasten the switch. I wish this also had hole installation on the switch, to push wires in. That makes the installation faster. Oh well. I like the look and feel of the switch. We replaced another switch (non-decora/decorator; a regular flip switch) because its glowing light had started to fail. We got tired of looking at the light flickering in the dark. So annoying! It’s the 3rd illuminated switch we had to replace. We’ll never buy one of those lighted switches again, as the illumination fails after a few years. I’ve used this brand before and it’s been reliable. Time will tell if we have the same good fortune with this one.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2023
reviews.title: Works ok after setup, could push wires in for installation but not recommended
